title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On motif platforms, such as Solaris, AIX, and HPUX, the Project Properties Info page displays text fields for readonly information (e.g., Path, Type). These text fields have automatic borders, identifying them as user input targets. Additionally, the fields have different colored backgrounds which make them stand out even more.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Select a Project.
2. Right-click and choose Properties.
3. On the subsequent Info page, observe the readonly fields (e.g., Path, Type) that are displayed as text fields.
